https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3Zkov4V8mYyC12l7m8SE3kXR1K2.jpg Years after their personal and professional breakup, the singing duo of Georgia and Joe Winter agree to reunite after their daughter, Belle, asks them to participate in a Christmas Charity concert, only to find themselves getting back in tune on stage and off. Christmas in Tune
